Text: I am so glad you are uploading the young and the restless to this site, cant find it any where else, here in australia we can only get it on pay tv and i cant aford that so i have to download it to see it, i recon its better as pay tv here in australia is 8 or 9 months behind the US, keep up wiith uploading it please me and a few others are counting on you for us to keep seeing it:):):)
Hi there! Thanks for your kind words. I can only say it's a pleasure for me letting you all watch this terrific show, wherever you live. So thanks again and 'stay tuned' ;)
